name: Overheat (GBJAM7 Version) (TRICKSTERhat)
description:
TIP: The version playable in HTML5 is just a playground to play with the unused weapons with no enemies, to play the original GBJAM title, download the game.

This was a one-level SHMUP game I've made for the GBJAM7 some time ago in 2019. Which I have deleted not too long due to reasons I wouldn't like going, but seeing this as it is my first game ever released. I decided to re-release it after it has been lost for a little.

The game itself features:

  • One singular level, based on spawners.
  • A brand new aiming system.
  • One song, composed by MiniMacro Sound.
  • Score and Hi-Score counters. (No saving though...)

Be sure to tell the high-scores in the comments. (Max for me is 2100)

I would of made this game playable on web, but I lost the final build source code.

ControlsKeyboardMoveArrow keysShootZPauseX AssetsCreditsEverything elseTRICKSTERhat (me, formerly known as magical)Rocksman fontDeadteamMusicMiniMacro SoundChiptune Player Extension for GMSMick @ GamePhase

As an extra I decided to upload an old prototype, playable in HTML5 which, while being empty. It features the option to play with weapons, unused in the final version.

WeaponKeyboardNormal1Double2Triple3Mine4

While Normal, Double and Triple are more of the same bullets.

Mine works as an stationary explosive, which will explode either on it's own or by pressing "X". But be careful, it can damage you.

Also, pausing is not available in the prototype.
